org.shared.array.kernel

Class DimensionOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.array.kernel.DimensionOps

  • public class DimensionOps
extends Object
    A class for dimension operations in pure Java.

    • Method Detail

      • assignBaseIndices

        public static final int[] assignBaseIndices(int nIndices,
                      int[] srcD,
                      int[] srcS,
                      int dim)
        Assigns base indices when excluding a dimension.
        Parameters:
        nIndices - the number of indices.
        srcD - the dimensions.
        srcS - the strides.
        dim - the dimension to exclude.
        Returns:
        the base physical indices.
